item.title: use gearman to distribute you nagios check
item.description: 安装 gearman 需要 boost > 1.39, libevent-devel, libuuid-devel, gperf 需要 gcc >= 4.2 export CC=gcc44 export CC=g++44 mod-gearman libtool-ltdl-devel ncurses-devel –with-gearman 配置 gearman 分为几个模块 mod_gearman: 负责把 nagios 中的检查任务发给 gearmand job server gearmand:
